Hikari Betta Bio Gold Floating Pellets
A  Scientifically Developed Diet For All Types Of Bettas. We love that this one floats to keep the tank floor tidy.
Nutritionally balanced, color-promoting food for Siamese fighting fish to keep them looking and feeling their best.
Naturally coloured by its ingredients, the fish food enhances the development of fish colours.
Great treat for all Bettas. These aren't ideal as a complete diet but can make Bettas very happy.
A great mix of fish meal and soyabean meal to provide protein makes this a great regular food.
